name: 10 Cent Classics: Shady Pack
description:
Available for the first time on computer systems, Shady's Stone Smash and Shady's Poopong: 22nd Anniversary Edition are now available together in one package, for 10 cents!

Shady's Stone Smash was released exclusively for Android in 2013. It was a remake of 2006's Stone Smash, with elements of CC & SH's mascot, Shady. This version has been optimized for a larger screen and uses assets from later games to accommodate.Shady's Poopong: 22nd Anniversary Edition was a parody of Shady's 20th Anniversary Edition, released exclusively on the OUYA home console in 2015. It featured tighter graphics and gameplay, and new voice acting from both Shady VA Steven W. Hunt, as well as an announcer voiced by veteran vocal thespian Michael McConnohie.
